categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones actors

nodes.text: Scott McLean served as a stunt double for the character Jango Fett in the 2002 film Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. McLean was also a stunt rigger for 2005's Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith. In recent years, McLean experienced a near-death injury from filming stunts for The Hangover: Part Two.
Scott McLean has been successfully part of the stunt industry since 1999, and his work includes the entire Matrix trilogy, the 2004 film Jessica (starring Leeanna Walsman), and Superman Returns.
